name: Alba(itch)
description:
This game  is made as a submission to the Sustainabilty Game Jam of 2020!
The game presents the rash change our world could undergo in the "nearby" future.
Even though desertification seems to be the main sustainability issue in this game, we tried to make shifting baselines the underlying topic. We aim to surprise the player with this fragile utopia and with how casually everybody seems to have adapted to this new world.The game is in Dutch.  As subtitles have not been implemented yet, we provided an English  script for translation!
